text: the vetson group is a global eye gaming
operator we operate more than 20 brands
in more than 10 jurisdiction around the
world we deliver everything from from
casino to live casino horse racing and
of course our sports book so since we
are a global operator we needed a
partnership with someone who has
presence in all the regions where we
operate today and regions where we will
operate so partnering up with AWS gave
us the possibility to both use the AWS
regions and also Technologies such as
the AWS outposts where regions are not
present for a sports book that is really
compute heavy and it also needs a lot of
real-time data we needed to be as close
as possible to the customers we have our
back office and the traders that that
set ups the game that actually makes
sure that we have the right price on the
bids and so on are located in Malta
spanning over to where we actually have
a real-time feed which is the AWS region
in Frankfurt from there we see the live
data over to the U.S east one AWS as
Cloud region and in state in Colorado
where we operate we have the AWS
outposts so we can have data in the
state that never leave state border but
we paired them up then on top of
everything with AWS cloudfront to make
sure that we have quick and easy access
to the data as close to the customers as
possible the benefits we get with
utilizing all of the AWS technologies
that we did for our sports book is that
first of all we don't need to have the
people ourselves to operate these type
of solutions across the world in
different time zones it also gives us
much faster time to Market because we
don't need to order and set it up
ourselves this is actually handled by
the AWS Personnel so when we release our
products for us it's just code and we
extend the availability Zone to the next
AWS Outpost that we set up we can free
up our internal resources they can put
that effort into making sure our end
customer actually get experience there
is so much need and work on getting into
new regions setting up new brands and
also of course releasing new products to
deliver entertainment we have to work
with people I'm working with the great
staff at AWS as well helps us a lot so
it's not just about servers or anything
like that it's all about the people in
the end
